faqs.q: How many calories in 1/2 cup of oats?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for dry rolled oats.

faqs.q: Are these calories for dry or cooked oats?
faqs.a: Dry, uncooked oats; cooking in water doesn't change calories but increases volume.
